title: SEO Agency
content:
SEO Agency for Local Businesses Who Refuse to Lose

We're an SEO agency that brings enterprise-level expertise to local businesses. No guesswork. No black boxes. Just data-driven optimization that makes you visible, credible, and profitable.

Get Your Free SEO Audit

What Makes an SEO Agency Actually Good?

Not all SEO agencies are created equal. The industry is full of:

  • Order-takers who just check boxes and file reports
  • Black-hat operators who promise overnight results with sketchy tactics
  • Generalists who spread themselves thin across every marketing channel
  • Enterprise-only shops that ignore businesses under $1M annual revenue

What you actually need:

  • Deep technical expertise (not just citations and backlinks)
  • Local SEO specialization (understanding Map Pack algorithms)
  • Transparent methodology (you know what we're doing and why)
  • Realistic expectations (no #1 ranking guarantees)
  • Measurable results (geo-grid tracking, not vanity metrics)

That's what LocalCatalyst delivers.

Our SEO Services

We offer four core SEO services, all integrated into a comprehensive strategy:

Google Business Profile Optimization

Your GBP is the #1 ranking factor for Map Pack visibility. We engineer every element using our proprietary 5-SPEC framework:

  • SPEC-001: Custom service entries (keyword-targeted micro-landing pages)
  • SPEC-002: Description engineering (entity co-citations, Local Hub Gambit)
  • SPEC-003: Strategic Q&A seeding (control the narrative, rank in search)
  • SPEC-004: Products tab optimization (conversion-focused)
  • SPEC-005: Strategic posting cadence (3x/week, AI Overview optimized)

Results: Average 312% increase in Map Pack visibility | 95% of clients rank in top 3

Learn more about GBP Optimization →

Local SEO Services

Comprehensive local search optimization that goes beyond basic citation building:

  • Citation management (build, audit, fix inconsistencies)
  • Local link acquisition (high-authority local backlinks)
  • Location page optimization (multi-location businesses)
  • Review generation (automated campaigns + response management)
  • Local content strategy (city hubs, neighborhood pages)
  • Local schema markup (LocalBusiness, Service, Organization)

Results: Businesses we optimize dominate their local markets

Learn more about Local SEO →

Technical SEO Services

Most local SEO agencies can't read a crawl report or implement schema markup. We can.

  • Core Web Vitals optimization (LCP, FID, CLS)
  • Site speed optimization (image compression, lazy loading, CDN)
  • Schema markup implementation (rich snippets, enhanced search listings)
  • Mobile optimization (responsive design, mobile-first indexing)
  • JavaScript SEO (rendering, crawlability)
  • Crawl budget optimization (fix crawl errors, optimize site architecture)

Results: Average 58% improvement in Core Web Vitals | 100% mobile-friendly compliance

Learn more about Technical SEO →

On-Page Optimization

Content optimization that ranks AND converts:

  • Keyword research & targeting strategy
  • Title tag optimization (CTR-focused, keyword-rich)
  • Meta description engineering (drive clicks from search results)
  • Header tag optimization (H1-H6 hierarchy)
  • Content expansion & optimization (comprehensive, authoritative content)
  • Internal linking strategy (hub-and-spoke architecture)
  • Conversion optimization (strategic CTA placement)

Results: Average 178% organic traffic increase | 92% keyword ranking improvement

Learn more about On-Page Optimization →

What Makes LocalCatalyst Different

We're Technical SEO Experts Who Specialize in Local

Most local SEO agencies understand citations and reviews but can't diagnose Core Web Vitals or implement schema markup.

Most technical SEO agencies understand site architecture but have never optimized a Google Business Profile.

We do both. We bring technical SEO depth to local SEO strategy. That combination is rare and powerful.

We Track Real Visibility, Not Vanity Metrics

We don't report meaningless metrics like "average ranking position" or "domain authority."

We track what matters:

  • Geo-Grid Rankings: Heat maps showing exactly where you rank across dozens of points in your service area
  • SoLV (Share of Local Voice): Your percentage of total Map Pack appearances compared to competitors
  • WVS (Weighted Visibility Score): Position-weighted ranking quality
  • Competitive Displacement: When you overtake a competitor in the Map Pack

This is how enterprise SEO agencies track visibility. We bring it to local businesses.

We Optimize for 2026, Not 2016

SEO evolves constantly. We stay ahead:

  • Then: Keyword stuffing | Now: Semantic relevance and topical authority
  • Then: Exact-match domains | Now: Brand authority and E-E-A-T signals
  • Then: Quantity of backlinks | Now: Quality and relevance of backlinks
  • Then: Basic on-page optimization | Now: AI Overview optimization and LLM citation engineering

We're Transparent About Everything

No black boxes. No vague "proprietary strategies."

Every client gets:

  • Weekly progress updates (what we did, what's next)
  • Monthly performance reports (rankings, traffic, conversions)
  • Full access to tracking dashboards (see your data anytime)
  • Direct communication (no account manager middlemen)
  • Honest answers to every question

Industries We Serve

We work with local businesses across industries who are serious about dominating their markets:

Home Services

HVAC, plumbing, electrical, roofing, landscaping, pest control, cleaning services. We know how to win Map Pack battles and generate high-intent leads.

Medical & Dental

Dentists, orthodontists, chiropractors, med spas, physical therapy, optometry. We understand YMYL (Your Money Your Life) SEO and deliver results without risk.

Legal Services

Law firms, attorneys, legal consultants, notaries. We use geo-grid tracking to identify market gaps and capture clients your competitors miss.

Hospitality

Restaurants, bars, hotels, event venues, catering. We optimize GBP to drive reservations, walk-ins, and bookings.

Professional Services

Accountants, insurance agents, financial advisors, real estate agents, consultants. We build content and optimization strategies that position you as the expert.

Our Process: The CATALYST Framework

We don't improvise. We don't use cookie-cutter templates. Every client gets a custom strategy based on our proven CATALYST framework:

A — Audit & Analysis

Comprehensive technical SEO audit, Google Business Profile scoring (5-SPEC framework), competitive analysis, keyword research, current ranking assessment.

Deliverable: Complete SEO audit report with prioritized opportunities

P — Prioritize & Plan

ROI-based prioritization, custom roadmap with timeline, clear deliverables and metrics, budget allocation.

Deliverable: Custom SEO roadmap with 90-day sprint plan

E — Execute & Engineer

GBP optimization, technical SEO implementation, content optimization, citation building, review generation, strategic content creation.

Deliverable: Weekly progress reports + monthly performance analysis

X — Expand & Accelerate

Ongoing optimization and refinement, content expansion, competitive monitoring, quarterly strategy reviews.

Deliverable: Continuous improvement and market domination

SEO Agency Pricing

SEO Audit Only — $1,200

Technical SEO audit, GBP scoring, competitive analysis, keyword research, prioritized roadmap. Timeline: 1 week.

Project-Based SEO — Starting at $3,500

Custom scope based on audit findings, implementation of prioritized optimizations, knowledge transfer. Timeline: 4-8 weeks.

Ongoing SEO Management — Starting at $1,500/month

All CATALYST framework phases, monthly optimization, weekly updates, monthly reporting, direct access to strategist. Minimum: 6 months.

Enterprise/Multi-Location — Custom Pricing

Contact us for custom pricing and scope.

Frequently Asked Questions About Hiring an SEO Agency

Q: How long does SEO take to show results?
A: Quick wins show in 2-4 weeks. Comprehensive campaigns show significant results within 8-12 weeks. We'll give you a realistic timeline based on your market.

Q: Can you guarantee #1 rankings?
A: No. Anyone who guarantees #1 rankings is lying or using black-hat tactics. We guarantee transparent methodology, consistent execution, and measurable progress.

Q: What's the difference between local SEO and regular SEO?
A: Local SEO focuses on Map Pack rankings and "near me" queries. Regular SEO focuses on organic rankings. Local businesses need both.

Q: Do I need an SEO agency or can I do it myself?
A: You can do basic SEO yourself. But competitive markets require technical expertise, strategic execution, and consistent effort. Agencies deliver ROI faster.

Q: How do I know if an SEO agency is legit?
A: Look for transparent methodology, realistic expectations, real case studies, client testimonials, and technical expertise.

Q: What's the ROI of hiring an SEO agency?
A: It depends on your business. A local service ranking #1 can generate 10-50+ leads/month worth thousands in revenue. If SEO generates $10K/month in new business and costs $2K/month, that's 5x ROI.

Ready to Work with an SEO Agency That Gets Results?

Schedule a free strategy call and get:

  • ✅ Complete SEO audit (technical, on-page, GBP)
  • ✅ Competitive analysis
  • ✅ Custom roadmap with timeline
  • ✅ ROI forecast

No pressure. No sales pitch. Just honest analysis and clear recommendations.

Schedule Your Free Strategy Call
